title: fillippone
author: fillippone
content: @theymos or @cyrus. Bitcoin Core has been released a few days ago. Technical details: Bitcoin Core 25.0 ReleasedCan you please update the colophon to the newest release? It' only an aesthetic thing, as the links already correctly points to versione 25.0.Thanks!

comments.author: Synchronice
comments.body: I always thought that this process was automated on website. As it seems, theymos has to log-in and manually edit the template. By the way, just checked Bitcoin.org and there hasn't been done any update since the release of Bitcoin Core version 22.0 As far as I know, user called Cøbra owns that website. His active on Twitter recently so idk why he didn't update the version list.

comments.author: fillippone
comments.body: Quote from: Synchronice on May 29, 2023, 08:21:25 AMI always thought that this process was automated on website. As it seems, theymos has to log-in and manually edit the template. By the way, just checked Bitcoin.org and there hasn't been done any update since the release of Bitcoin Core version 22.0 As far as I know, user called Cøbra owns that website. His active on Twitter recently so idk why he didn't update the version list.You are looking at the wrong website.I suggest you to look at bitcoincore.orgThe link in the colophon is correct, it actually points to the tastes release.

comments.author: ABCbits
comments.body: This kind of thread always pop-up whenever new version of Bitcoin Core released. Usually we just have to wait for few days before it gets updated.Quote from: fillippone on May 28, 2023, 03:50:45 PMIt' only an aesthetic thing, as the links already correctly points to versione 25.0.That's only because https://bitcoincore.org/en/download/ automatically point to latest version. The torrent link still points to version 24.0.1.

comments.author: fillippone
comments.body: Quote from: ETFbitcoin on May 29, 2023, 09:53:21 AMThis kind of thread always pop-up whenever new version of Bitcoin Core released. Usually we just have to wait for few days before it gets updated.Quote from: fillippone on May 28, 2023, 03:50:45 PMIt' only an aesthetic thing, as the links already correctly points to versione 25.0.That's only because https://bitcoincore.org/en/download/ automatically point to latest version. The torrent link still points to version 24.0.1.I know this wasn’t the most exciting post, but the release was a few days ago, as it was @achow101’s post. I tought it was worth a gentle poke to @theymos as 25.0 also marks a major release.

comments.author: fillippone
comments.body: Aaand it’s done!Finally my OCD is satisfied.Thank you @theymos

comments.author: LFC_Bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: fillippone on May 30, 2023, 05:31:31 AMAaand it’s done!Finally my OCD is satisfied.Thank you @theymosI’m still running 0.18.0I hate upgrading Verifying my download always scares the hell out of me but yes thanks theymos. I might finally upgrade soon before my version gets too old it’s not supported (that happened before to me).
